AnnotationShape[source]

Enum = [NONE, CIRCLE, ELLIPSE, POINT, POLYGON, RECTANGLE]

The supported annotation shape types

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

parse_shape[source]

parse_shape(shape_str)

Try to parse the shape from a string representation. shape_str: the shape as string return: the parsed AnnotationShape raises: ValueError if unsupported shape parsed

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Annotation[source]

Annotation(shape=<AnnotationShape.NONE: 'none'>, points_x=None, points_y=None, radius_x=0, radius_y=0, labels=None)

A annotation shape: the annotation shape points_x: a list of points x-coordinates points_y: a list of points y-coordinates radius_x: a radius on x-coordinate radius_y: a radius on y-coordinate labels: a set of annotation labels

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FileAnnotation[source]

FileAnnotation(file_id=None, file_name=None, file_size=None, file_path=None, annotations=None)

The annotations for a file. file_id: a unique file identifier file_name: the file file_size: the file size file_path: the file path annotations: A list of annotations

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

convert_annotation[source]

convert_annotation(annotation:Annotation, target_shape:AnnotationShape)

Convert annotation shape and points to target shape. annotation: the annotation to convert target_shape: the target shape to convert to

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

annotation_bounding_box[source]

annotation_bounding_box(annotation:Annotation)

Calculates the annotation bounding box. annotation: the annotation return: a tuple of points_x and points_y
